item.title: Git Commit Signing with GPG & YubiKey
item.description: After learning about how GitHub displays names and profile pictures next to commits, and how this mechanism can be abused rather easily, I decided to enhance the integrity of my public-facing activity on GitHub by attaching digital signatures to my commits.
